mapper.select: SELECT /* com.at.apcss.am.cmns.mapper.SpmtPckgUnitMapper.selectSpmtPckgUnit */ SPU.APC_CD AS APC_CD , SPU.SPMT_PCKG_UNIT_CD AS SPMT_PCKG_UNIT_CD , SPU.SPMT_PCKG_UNIT_NM AS SPMT_PCKG_UNIT_NM , SPU.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD , SPU.VRTY_CD AS VRTY_CD , SPU.SPCFCT_CD AS SPCFCT_CD , SPU.NTSL_UNTPRC AS NTSL_UNTPRC , SPU.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN , SPU.GDS_GRD AS GDS_GRD , SPU.BRND_NM AS BRND_NM , (SELECT X.WGHT FROM TB_APC_SPCFCT_CRTR X WHERE X.APC_CD = SPU.APC_CD AND X.ITEM_CD = SPU.ITEM_CD AND X.SPCFCT_CD = SPU.SPCFCT_CD AND X.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AS SPCFCT_WGHT FROM TB_SPMT_PCKG_UNIT SPU WHERE SPU.APC_CD = #{apcCd} AND SPU.SPMT_PCKG_UNIT_CD = #{spmtPckgUnitCd} AND SPU.DEL_YN = 'N'
/* com.at.apcss.am.cmns.mapper.SpmtPckgUnitMapper.getSpmtPckgUnitCd */ SELECT FN_GET_ID_SPMT_PCKG_UNIT_CD(#{apcCd}) AS SPMT_PCKG_UNIT_CD FROM DUAL
